itunes:title: Episode 936 - Finding Your Edge As A Man With Dr. Mike Simpson
title: Episode 936 - Finding Your Edge As A Man With Dr. Mike Simpson
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Dr. Mike Simpson, a former JSOC Army physician and author of Honed: Finding Your Edge as a Man Over 40, joins the show to talk about how men over 40 can keep their bodies healthy, his experience serving as an operator before and after 9/11, and what medi...
itunes:summary:
Dr. Mike Simpson, a former JSOC Army physician and author of Honed: Finding Your Edge as a Man Over 40, joins the show to talk about how men over 40 can keep their bodies healthy, his experience serving as an operator before and after 9/11, and what medicine (in particular emergency medicine) has learned from the last 20 years of combat during the Global War on Terror.
